channel.title: work dinner on courtside nyc
channel.description: Recent content in work dinner on courtside nyc

item.title: din thai fung
item.description: thoughts operates with the efficiency of small hotel menu highlights pork xiao long bao string beans

item.title: nerina
item.description: thoughts wine list is amazing menu highlights zucchini chips lemon potato gnocchi

item.title: crevette
item.description: thoughts that corner is cursed, not sure it will last menu highlights lemon dessert was unreal

item.title: la dong
item.description: thoughts space is beautiful menu highlights crab fried rice draft lager

item.title: coqodaq
item.description: thoughts the big sink with like 15 soaps to wash your hands right at the entrance was simply delightful service 10/10 no notes coat check menu highlights chicken bucket duh caviar not necessary imo

item.title: mission ceviche
item.description: locations upper east side union square thoughts “8/10, too nice inside” - travis clarke (the ceviche king himself) menu highlights red snapper

item.title: paros
item.description: thoughts lot of suits menu highlights dessert

item.title: tatiana by kwame onwuachi
item.description: thoughts walk into lincoln center, it’s on the right menu highlights everything we ate was insanely good my two favorites were the egusi dumplings & the short rib pastrami suya

item.title: konbon
item.description: thoughts fantastic menu highlights scallop carpaccio mazemen (not spicy) corn dessert is so realistic i looked at the table next to us trying to cut theirs in half and thought to myself “who the fuck cuts corn like that”

item.title: golden swan
item.description: thoughts old converted town house, multiple levels, full shower in one of the bathrooms, very cool bar on first floor is also great for a date rented out the entire top floor for work dinner, fanastic menu highlights sticky toffee pudding

item.title: cath√©drale
item.description: thoughts space is beautfiul, so much fun for birthday dinner menu highlights octopus, tomatoes

item.title: gallow green
item.description: thoughts restaurant on the roof of the mccitrick hotel, where they do sleep no more(a live reenactment of shakespeare’s macbeth) very interesting vibe, staff are sometimes also actors in the show, quirky vibes summer only, no outdoor heaters so if it’s cold dress warm

item.title: au cheval
item.description: thoughts brought my dad here when i couldn’t do another steakhouse. he loved it. basement bar menu highlights the burger, duh

item.title: mel's
item.description: thoughts great spot to come with a big group or a birthday dinner. menu highlights “the oil” side sauce the ice cream sundaes are gas

item.title: rule of thirds
item.description: thoughts had my company holiday party here and it was a huge hit, also surprisingly affordable for 35 people. menu highlights duck fried chicken rice cooker pudding - not for everyone but i loved it.

item.title: chama mama
item.description: menu highlights try the georgian wine! mushrooms sleeper hit
